sentence: Looking at options trading activity among components of the S&P 500 index, there is noteworthy activity today in Arconic Inc (Symbol: ARNC), where a total volume of 26,867 contracts has been traded thus far today, a contract volume which is representative of approximately 2.7 million underlying shares (given that every 1 contract represents 100 underlying shares).
That number works out to 50.9% of ARNC's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 5.3 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $23 strike call option expiring February 15, 2019 , with 8,158 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 815,800 underlying shares of ARNC.

Below is a chart showing ARNC's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $23 strike highlighted in orange:

Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (Symbol: REGN) saw options trading volume of 3,976 contracts, representing approximately 397,600 underlying shares or approximately 50.9% of REGN's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 781,570 shares.
Especially high volume was seen for the $400 strike call option expiring January 04, 2019 , with 234 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 23,400 underlying shares of REGN.

Below is a chart showing REGN's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $400 strike highlighted in orange:

And Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) saw options trading volume of 30,852 contracts, representing approximately 3.1 million underlying shares or approximately 43.5% of CRM's average daily trading volume over the past month, of 7.1 million shares.
Particularly high volume was seen for the $130 strike put option expiring January 18, 2019 , with 5,697 contracts trading so far today, representing approximately 569,700 underlying shares of CRM.

Below is a chart showing CRM's trailing twelve month trading history, with the $130 strike highlighted in orange:
